fields_of_interest: Consumers, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Single market, Public Health
eu_initiatives:
Integration of homeopathy into the European health care systems. 
Improvement of the availability of homeopathic medicinal products (HMPs).
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
Collaboration with other European CAM medical associations in CAMDOC (www.camdoc.eu) 
Collaboration with other European associations in the field of CAM, such as practitioners' and patients' organisations in EUROCAM 
Member of EPHA - European Public Health Alliance
relevant_communication:
CEN Standards of services of medical doctors with additional qualifications in homeopathy. 
Homeopathy in Europe - United in Diversity.
legal_status: international association having philanthropic, scientific and educational aims, registered under the Belgian law of 25th October 1919, modified by the law of 6th December 1954.
